title: HEALTH ADVICE 1
alt: Person running on a wooden pathway on the beach with the sun near the horizon
text: Try to combine cardiovascular exercise with a sedentary activity that you already do.

title: HEALTH ADVICE 2
alt: Woman sleeping on the bed with a white pillow and a white blanket
text: Don't take naps after 3pm, and don't nap longer than 20 minutes.

title: HEALTH ADVICE 3
alt: Bowl of salad with various fruits and vegetables such as brocolli, tomatoes, purple cabbage, and avocados, drizzled with a creamy white dressing
text: Choose foods with healthy fats, limit foods high in saturated fat, and avoid foods with trans fat.
